WorkItem.Description:
Wishlistitem...
Â 
Animated gifs for Newsitems would be nice.
It works in News_view, but not with the repeater on default.aspx
I also remember having trouble using a graphic with a transparent color.

Comments.Message: Little unsure why this would not work.  Could you upload an image here and I'll take a look
There is no problem with showing animated gifs in textboxes when you use FCK.The "problem" occurs in the ImageThumbnails.

For your transparency problem... are you by any chance using IE6? Try it in FF or IE7 and the transparency will work. I have done some searching and I have yet to find a working fix for the problem in IE6.
